code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant WR as Writer
    participant N as Ra Node
    participant W as WAL
    participant S as Segment Writer
    WR->>+N: {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}
    N-X+W: {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}
    W->W: fsync
    W-XN: {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}
    N->>WR: command_appended
    deactivate N
    deactivate W
    loop until full
        W->W: write(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    end
    W-X+S: {IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]}
    Note right of S: mem_tables -> segments
    S -X N: {IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]}
    deactivate S

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'？
